snippet: Facing a public outcry, federal officials announced Wednesday that they would not put thousands of acres of public lands in Colorado’s North Fork Valley up for bid at auction this month for oil and gas drilling.
abstract: Bureau of Land Management, facing public outcry, announces that it will not put thousands of acres of public lands in Colorado’s North Fork Valley up for bid at auction for oil and gas drilling.
lead_paragraph: Facing a public outcry, federal officials announced Wednesday that they would not put thousands of acres of public lands in Colorado’s North Fork Valley up for bid at auction this month for oil and gas drilling.

headline.main: Colorado: Contested Gas Leases Are Delayed
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Contested Gas Leases Are Delayed
